description: The oldest bakery of the town of Guri, run by the http://anidb.net/ch26004 [baker] and http://anidb.net/ch26014 [his wife], and employing (at least) one http://anidb.net/ch26005 [human worker] plus one http://anidb.net/ch14486 [Haibane]. This is one of the few places in Guri where Haibane can work for their living.
name: Bakery
